file_content.text: A little patience, please. Sabotage takes time.
Work, blast you! Work!
My beautiful machines, ruined because of you!
Emperor Malgus will be furious. He'll disown the Schism Collective... or worse. Unless... you put in a word for us with the Republic?
Disable the station's shields, and I'll mention your cooperation to the Supreme Commander.
Only if you help us first.
Of course! It will take some clever slicing, but that's my specialty.
Ahem. Schism Collective, this is Arkis Wode. Evacuate the space station, and surrender to the Republic. Our time here is up.
And to commemorate our newfound friendship, I'll program our flux cannons to fire on the stealth armada. Just a few more minutes....
The Republic doesn't offer asylum to war criminals.
You deserve this. [Kill him]
What happened to Republic mercy?
You're quite the cold-blooded murderer, Jedi.
I didn't know Republic soldiers were authorized to use such brutality.
I wouldn't call that self-defense, Captain.
Such violence. What would the Supreme Commander say?
I am watching you. Do not keep an Emperor waiting.
Guards! Reinforcements! Somebody help... oh.
Please, those things I said, and HK, it was all a misunderstanding! Just let me live!
You are an ally to Malgus the Betrayer and a traitor to the Empire.
I think not. [Kill Arkis Wode]
He's in the power core, Emperor Malgus! He's coming--!
She's coming for you, Emperor Malgus! She's--!
Emperor Malgus! They're coming for you! They're--!
Thank you for the warning, Arkis Wode.
Don't keep me waiting, Sith.
I trust you'll be punctual, agent.
Face me, hunter. If you can reach me.
I expect your company shortly.
Sabotage your stealth armada, and the Empire will ignore your crimes.
Prove your loyalty and live.
But that will take hours!
Fine! I'll overload the Foundry generators. The results to the hangars will be catastrophic.
I'll also program our flux cannons to target the stealth armada. Anything to protect our escape pods--and the Imperial fleet, of course!
Protect me, HK!
You didn't heed my warning, Master Jedi.
Bad move, Major.
Did you think I wouldn't notice you sauntering through my territory?
You're not supposed to be here.
My holomessage strictly stated that the power core is the domain of the Schism Collective. Maybe I wasn't clear enough.
That's the sound of my flux cannons incinerating one of your capital ships. Shall I do it again?
There's been enough violence already. Step away from the controls, and let's talk.
Calm down.
Don't patronize me!
The Schism Collective's technology could benefit millions, yet you settle for Malgus's twisted perversion.
You're wasting your talent.
Malgus allows our work to flourish. Let me show you again!
You aren't going to fire the superlaser.
[Force Persuade] Stop.
I'm not going to fire the superlaser.
You've had plenty of fun already.
Enough games. [Shoot controls]
What--? You--!
Fire it again and you're dead.
I don't respond to threats, but I respect a bold move.
This battle station is the galaxy's greatest technological marvel. And it's all made possible by Anomid genius, by the Schism Collective!
Interjection: Silence, meatbag!
It's... but... your upgrades....
Statement: I am HK-47, commander of the Foundry and personal exterminator to Emperor Malgus.
My master activated me ahead of schedule--to eliminate the Republic organic.
My master activated me early--to assassinate the Republic organics.
Nothing will stand in my way of reaching Darth Malgus.
You will fail.
Disagreement: On the contrary, Jedi. I have analyzed your lightsaber technique, and your form is weak.
Most assassin droids are stripped of emotion. Does your programming benefit your effectiveness?
You seem excited.
Compliment: Astute observation, Jedi. My programming hones my efficiency. Bloodlust is a pleasant side effect.
Process this: We have superior numbers, and you're rusty from inaction.
You're outnumbered, HK.
Advisory: I have analyzed your collective combat proficiency. My assassination rating remains at eighty-nine-point-nine percent chance of success--more than sufficient.
I'm a member of Havoc Squad, a major in the Republic military and an expert in small- and large-arms fire.
Try me.
Advisory: My programming contains your complete combat profile. Your death will be disappointingly easy, but I will do my best to enjoy it.
One false move and Arkis here will never be able to put you back together.
Watch it, scrap heap.
Advisory: Foolish bravado will only make your demise more painful.
Why would an Emperor want an assassin droid?
You're Malgus's droid?
Recitation: I have served many masters, all shapers of the galaxy. Master Malgus seeks to join their ranks.
Calm down, HK.
Advisory: My master calls for your head. I will give it to him, along with other sundry parts.
Reassurance: The 47 series is an inferior model, master. Easily dismantled.
Correction: Inaccurate! The 47 series remains the pinnacle of Hunter-Killer models! My upgrades further secure my superiority.
Stand clear, scientist. Assassination protocols engaged.
You're going to enjoy this, my lord.
Right on schedule, officer.
Just in time for the show, hunter.
Perfect timing!
Such power! With one movement, our flux cannons fire and an Imperial capital ship is disintegrated!
The Schism Collective has crafted this battle station into the galaxy's greatest technological marvel. Not even your entire fleet can take us down.
The Imperial fleet will crush this battle station, but first... your throat.
You're mistaken. [Force Choke]
Help! Somebody!
Turn off the station's weapons! Now!
Shut it down! [Shock him]
Aaaaah!
Everything has a weakness. For example, the Anomid skeleton. One well-placed shot can reduce the body to a crippled husk.
I disagree. [Aim weapon]
The station may survive, but you won't.
Don't push it. [Aim weapon]
You wouldn't dare!
Warning: Stop, meatbag!
What is the "Schism Collective"?
The "Schism Collective"?
We are an exclusive Anomid group composed of the best technical minds in the galaxy.
It's freaks like you that give the Empire reason to hate all non-humans.
You disgust me.
Your Empire has brainwashed you!
Freaks like you are why the Empire should purge all aliens from the galaxy.
Only an alien would say that.
Such human prejudice is exactly why we joined Emperor Malgus!
Interjection: Silence, meatbags.
Do not move, Sith. Your Force cannot corrupt my targeting data.
My weapon is trained on your spine, officer.
I hoped you wouldn't be such easy prey.
My targeting computer has scanned your soft spots.
The first shot will immobilize you. The second will spill your slippery components onto the floor.
I should have known Malgus would rebuild you after I destroyed you in the Foundry.
Hello, HK-47.
Bitter recollection: A fault in my assassination protocol allowed your victory. My upgrades will prevent the error from repeating.
Stand down or I'll be forced to disassemble you.
This isn't your fight, droid.
Statement: I am HK-47, personal exterminator to Emperor Malgus. Backing down from violence would violate my programming.
Make and model number, droid.
Annoyed reminder: I am HK-47, assassin droid and personal exterminator to Emperor Malgus. We met once before on the Foundry.
What's your model number?
Statement: I am HK-47, commander of the Foundry and personal exterminator to Emperor Malgus.
Reassurance: An inferior iteration, master. Nothing to fear.
Don't do anything rash.
Correction: I have analyzed every possible outcome of this confrontation. All end in violence.
Try me, droid.
Observation: I am pleased to face an opponent who shares my taste for violence.
Reassurance: This is an inferior HK model, master.
Objection: Your HK is in error! I am fully upgraded to exterminator standards. I am a paragon of brutal efficiency!
Weapons activated. Assassination protocol engaged. I have been looking forward to this.
No distractions!
